metadata.title: CVE-2019-14587 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Logic issue EDK II may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enabledenial of service via adjacent access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14587` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.1
qemu-efi - 0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0~20160408.ffea0a2c-2ubuntu0.1').
